Description:
Business Intelligence Specialist (Tableau and Alteryx) - Riyadh || Arabic Speaking Must || ImmediateCollaborate in cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical ones.
Collect, refine, and prepare complex datasets for analytics and visualization.
Identify patterns and meaningful insights from data by analyzing it.
Create wireframes and beta dashboards with a focus on user experience, correctness, and visibility ·
Develop interactive business intelligence dashboard using tools such as Tableau and Alteryx.
Test and publish dashboards and reports and schedule refresh.
Solve any data or performance issues related to workbooks and data sources.
Deliver complex and actionable reports that show KPIs, identify areas of improvement into current operations, and display root cause analysis of problems.
Ensure data quality, adherence to guidelines, business impact, and other risk-related metrics.
Create technical documentation for BI tools and solutions.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 3 years of Business Intelligence experience.
Must be a native Arabic speaker
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems or Data Science or Applied Mathematics
Professional experience with: BI tools, data visualization, Javascript, D3, Python, Excel and writing highly-optimized SQL queries across large datasets.
Technical knowledge of Tableau products and versions including Tableau Server, Tableau Public, Tableau Online, Tableau Desktop.
Familiar with database management systems, data modeling, ETL, visual design principles
